welcome_message_body: Welcome to Nuevo Laredo! Get ready to experience the vibrant culture, delicious cuisine, and lively atmosphere that this city is known for. We hope you have a wonderful time exploring and enjoying all that Nuevo Laredo has to offer.

restaurants.name: La Fogata
restaurants.description: La Fogata is a mexican restaurant located in Nuevo Laredo.

restaurants.name: Restaurant Las Espuelas
restaurants.description: Restaurant Las Espuelas is a soup spot located in Nuevo Laredo.

restaurants.name: Amarantos
restaurants.description: Amarantos is a café located in Nuevo Laredo.

restaurants.name: La Paisana
restaurants.description: La Paisana is a mexican restaurant located in Nuevo Laredo.

restaurants.name: Al Dahabi
restaurants.description: Al Dahabi is a diner located in Nuevo Laredo.
restaurants.address: Avda. Guerrero #1729 (C./ Washington), Nuevo Laredo, Tamaulipas

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Laredo International Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Laredo International Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at International Quetzalcoatl Airport is where all international and domestic flights are serviced.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at International Quetzalcoatl Airport handles all freight and cargo shipments for the airport.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
